name: Aeth'kai
description: The greatest civilization the multiverse ever knew. They mastered interdimensional travel, created the First Tongue language, and built structures that still stand across dimensions. They tried to fight Nolem alone, and he consumed every last one of them.

achievements.name: Interdimensional Travel
achievements.description: Could move freely between dimensions without technology

achievements.name: First Tongue
achievements.description: Created the primordial language with words of power

achievements.name: Dimensional Architecture
achievements.description: Built structures that exist across multiple dimensions simultaneously

achievements.name: Prophecy
achievements.description: Could see possible futures and left warnings

achievements.name: Soul Preservation
achievements.description: Techniques to preserve consciousness — though ultimately failed

society.fatalFlaw: Valued independence over connection. Fought alone.

fall.tragedy: They had no concept of cross-species bonding
fall.consequence: Nolem gained immense power from their collective intelligence

ruins.danger: Some ruins are trapped or guarded by remnant energy

artifacts.name: Aeth'kai Beacons
artifacts.description: Devices that mark dimensional weak points

artifacts.name: Memory Crystals
artifacts.description: Preserved final thoughts of individual Aeth'kai

prophecy.name: The Aeth'kai Warning
prophecy.text: When the Unraveling wakes and the echoes dim, the Shepherd and the Pig shall meet again. Not as one, but as thousands-made-one, the heart-chain restored, the darkness undone. But beware the cost—to bind what was torn, a sacrifice made as it was when first born.
prophecy.interpretation: Nike Prime will defeat Nolem, but recreating the First Bond requires a sacrifice

lesson.quote: The Aeth'kai were the greatest civilization the multiverse ever knew. They had power we can't imagine. And Nolem ate them ALL. We're only alive because OG Charles and OG Nike learned the one lesson the Aeth'kai never did: you can't survive alone.

mysteries.question: Did any Aeth'kai survive?
theories: Memory crystals might contain full consciousnesses
Some might exist in the Void Between

theories: They might have fought Nolem before
